title: Ilan Van Wilder Wins to Send Message on Merger: ‘We Want to Continue as Soudal Quick-Step’
content:
Belgian star speaks his mind on possible merger just moments after winning Tre Valli Varesine: 'We are strong enough ourselves.'

Read the full article at Ilan Van Wilder Wins to Send Message on Merger: ‘We Want to Continue as Soudal Quick-Step’ on Velo.
author: ahood
